applicant_tracker_data.Name: John Doe
applicant_tracker_data.Notes: Excellent candidate, strong technical skills, great cultural fit

applicant_tracker_data.Name: Jane Smith
applicant_tracker_data.Notes: Borderline candidate, awaiting second interview decision

applicant_tracker_data.Name: Michael Chen
applicant_tracker_data.Notes: Outstanding candidate, PhD level, would be great for senior role

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Hi John, thanks for joining us today. Can you start by telling us about your current role?

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: Sure! I'm currently a Backend Engineer at TechCorp, where I've been for the past 3 years. I work primarily with Python and Django, building microservices for our e-commerce platform.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: That sounds great. Can you describe a challenging technical problem you've solved recently?

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: Absolutely. We had a performance issue with our payment processing service. Transactions were taking 5-10 seconds, which was causing customer complaints. I analyzed the bottleneck and found it was in our database queries. I implemented query optimization, added Redis caching for frequently accessed data, and restructured our API calls. We reduced response time to under 500ms.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Impressive! How do you approach code reviews and collaboration with your team?

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: I believe in constructive feedback. I always look for learning opportunities in reviews - both giving and receiving feedback. I focus on code maintainability, test coverage, and adherence to our coding standards. I also mentor junior developers and conduct weekly knowledge-sharing sessions.

assessment.subjective_summary: John demonstrated excellent technical knowledge and problem-solving skills. His approach to the payment processing optimization showed systematic thinking and practical expertise. Communication was clear and professional. He seems genuinely passionate about mentoring and team growth.
assessment.objective_summary: Candidate has 5 years experience with strong Python/Django background. Successfully solved critical production issues. CV score of 8.4 combined with interview performance of 8.75 gives overall rating of 8.6. Highly recommended for mid-level backend role.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Hi Jane, welcome! Tell me about your experience with backend development.

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: Hi! I've been working as a full-stack developer for about 3 and a half years. I mainly work with Node.js and Express on the backend, and React on the frontend. I've built several REST APIs and worked with MongoDB.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: Good. Have you worked with Python before?

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: I've done some Python scripting and took a course on it, but I haven't used it in production. I'm confident I can pick it up quickly though, since I'm already familiar with backend concepts.

transcript.speaker: Interviewer
transcript.text: What about containerization and deployment? Any experience with Docker or Kubernetes?

transcript.speaker: Interviewee
transcript.text: Um, I've heard of Docker but haven't used it hands-on. We have a DevOps team that handles deployments at my current company. I mostly focus on the application code.

assessment.subjective_summary: Jane has decent full-stack experience but lacks hands-on Python production experience and infrastructure knowledge. She seems eager to learn and has good communication skills. Would benefit from a technical assessment to gauge learning ability.
assessment.objective_summary: 3.5 years experience, primarily Node.js/React. CV score of 7.0 with interview score of 6.75 gives overall 6.9. Missing some key requirements but shows potential. Recommend technical assessment and second interview before final decision.

Requirements: 5+ years of professional frontend development experience
Expert knowledge of React and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
Experience with state management (Redux, MobX, or similar)
Proficiency with CSS/SASS and responsive design
Experience with REST APIs and async programming
Git version control and collaborative development workflows
Nice-to-have: Experience with Next.js or other SSR frameworks
job_listing_intake.Notes: Looking for a technical leader who can mentor junior developers and contribute to architectural decisions. Must have excellent communication skills and ability to work in cross-functional teams.
